methods.boolean addAlias(String param, String al: Add an alias for an already defined parameter.
methods.String getParamArgument(String paramName: Get the argument to a parameter, if it exists.
methods.String[] getRestArgs(): Get the rest of the args, i.e., args that follow the last know parameter.
methods.boolean isInArgsList(String paramName): Check if the parameter was used on the command line.
methods.boolean isKnownParameter(String paramNam: Check if the given parameter name is known to this parser.
